mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into member values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address},#{gender}, default, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select b.BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_COUNT from BOARD_SCRAP b join board A on b.BOARD_ID = a.BOARD_ID join member m on b.USER_ID = m.USER_ID where m.USER_ID = #{id} order by b.BOARD_ID DESC
select * from visit where ID = #{id} and to_char(VISIT_TIME, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd')
select * from member join visit using(id) where to_char(VISIT_TIME, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd')
select visit_date, visit_count from (select to_char(visit_time, 'mm-dd') visit_date, count(*) visit_count from visit GROUP by to_char(visit_time, 'mm-dd') order by visit_date desc) where rownum <= 7
select count(*) from member where status = 'Y'

select id, name, nickname, phone, enroll_date, report, member_type, max(to_char(visit_time, 'yy-mm-dd')) LAST_VISIT from member left join VISIT using(id) where status = 'Y' and
MEMBER_TYPE = 'N'
MEMBER_TYPE = 'H'
MEMBER_TYPE = 'A'
and id LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
GROUP by (id, name, nickname, phone, enroll_date, report, member_type)

select enroll_date, member_count from (select to_char(enroll_date, 'yy-mm-dd') enroll_date, count(*) member_count from member group by to_char(enroll_date, 'yy-mm-dd') order by enroll_date desc) where rownum <= 7
select * from (select to_char(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'mm.dd') create_date, count(*) count from board group by to_char(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'mm.dd') order by create_date desc) where rownum <= 7
select count(*) from board where board_status = 'Y'

select * from board where board_status = 'Y' and
BOARD_TYPE = 'R'
BOARD_TYPE = 'P'
and BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
